textBeforeTable: Servings Per Container: About 14 Serving Size: 1/4 cup (55 g) dry Nutrition Facts Whole Grain Millet Product Label: With 55 g or more whole grains per serving, Bob's Red Mill millet is a healthy, gluten-free option for any meal. Millet has a mild, sweet flavor, and quick cooking time. This ancient grain originated in the Far East, and remains a popular option in Asia. Enjoy whole grain millet as a unique alternative to rice in salads, stir-fries and porridge. High in fiber; gluten-free Traditional grain of Asia Whole grain millet Whole Grain Millet Product Description: If you are dissatisfied for any reason, we'll give you a full refund and pay return shipping. textAfterTable: *Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs.   Calories 2,000 2,500 Total Fat Less than 65 grams 80 grams Saturated Fat Less than 20 grams 25 grams Cholesterol Less than 300 mg 300 mg Sodium Less than 2,400 mg 2,400 mg Total Carbohydrate   300 grams 375 grams Dietary Fiber   25 grams 30 grams Calories per gram: Fat 9 Carbohydrate 4 Protein 4 INGREDIENT: Whole Grain Hulled Millet. Manufactured in a facility that uses tree nuts and soy. BASIC COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Bring 2 cups water or stock to a boil in a pot. Add 1 cup millet; cover, reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until all water is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Makes 4 servings (about 2½ cups). Additional recipes listed on package. Keeps best refrigerated or frozen. Product of U.S.A. Gluten Free Batch tested in a quality control laboratory. An ELISA Gluten Assay test is used to confirm that a product is gluten free. 100% Whole Grain Kosher Terms and Ingredient Definitions Whole Grain Millet
